hardware.name: CPU
hardware.cores: Number of processing units inside the CPU.
hardware.clock_speed: The rate at which the CPU executes instructions.
hardware.cache: Small, high-speed memory for storing frequently accessed data.
hardware.TDP: Amount of heat the CPU generates under maximum load.

hardware.name: RAM
hardware.latency: Time delay between request and response for data.
hardware.form_factor: Physical size and shape of the RAM (e.g., DIMM, SO-DIMM).

hardware.name: GPU
hardware.VRAM: Video RAM used by the GPU for storing textures and image data.
hardware.CUDA_cores: Processing units in NVIDIA GPUs, important for parallel tasks.
hardware.clock_speed: Rate at which the GPU processes data.
hardware.ports: Connections for output to monitors (HDMI, DisplayPort).
